alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 27 at 1:02AM MST until January 27 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential ice on bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
